titleStmt.title: A sermon preached March 6, 1675, in the Cathedral Church of S. Peter in York, before the Right Honourable Sir Timothy Littleton, Kt., and Vere Bertie, Esquire, His Majesties judges of assize for the Northern Circuit by William Stainforth ...
titleStmt.author: Stainforth, William, d. 1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston ... and R. Lambert ...,
